isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING PROTECTION AND DIAGNOSTIC SYSTEM (APAds™) DESCRIPTION, OPERATION, TROUBLESHOOTING, REMOVE, INSTALL, AND ELECTRICAL CIRCUIT DIAGRAMS MAINTENANCE MANUAL - REMOVE

svcsubsecinfo.para: Refer to the Component Location Section when performing the remove procedures for the APADS components.
Refer to GROUP 16-AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the A/C system components.

svcproc.title: APADS CONTROL MODULE
svcproc.para: The APADS control module remove procedures are in the following steps.

step1.para: Turn vehicle ignition to the OFF position.
Unbind and release the wires so they hang freely.
Disconnect the APADS control module cable connectors from the wiring harness.
Disconnect the two bolts securing the module to the vehicle bulkhead wall located on the right or left sides of the engine, or in the right side luggage compartment.
